<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Athletic Strategist](/Feats.aspx?ID=1452) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Investigator" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=318" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 60 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3)

</column>

---

You know how to calculatedly manipulate joints and body weight. In addition to using [Devise a Stratagem](/Actions.aspx?ID=546) to modify a Strike, you can use it to modify a [Disarm](/Actions.aspx?ID=41), [Grapple](/Actions.aspx?ID=35), [Shove](/Actions.aspx?ID=38), or [Trip](/Actions.aspx?ID=40) attempt, substituting your Devise a Stratagem roll for the [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check. You must apply the substitution to the first eligible attack you make, whether it's a Strike or one of the Athletics actions.

 You can also use your Intelligence modifier instead of Strength for the Athletics check when you substitute your Devise a Stratagem roll, unless you're using a weapon for the maneuver and the weapon doesn't fit the restrictions for using Intelligence with a stratagem.
name: Athletic Strategist
